ol.li: cultivating, propagating and harvesting plants or fungi or their products or parts, including seeds, spores, bulbs or the like, but does not include forestry; or

maintaining animals in any physical environment for the purposes of—
breeding them; or
selling them; or
acquiring and selling their bodily produce such as milk, wool, eggs or the like; or

glossdef.p: but does not include forestry or maintaining animals for sport or recreational purposes.
